```js
    var a = { value: 1};
    var b = { value: 1 };

    expect(a).toEqual(b);  // success, same as == comparison
    expect(b).toBe(b);     // failure, same as === comparison
    expect(a).toBe(a);     // success, same as === comparison
    ```
